title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck
title_original: ZAFUL Sweater Dresses for Women 2025 Fall Fashion Casual V Neck Long Sleeve Wrap Midi Dress with Belt Knit Business Outfits

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #340,533 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #4,100 in Women's Casual Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Casual

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Sheer and clingy
items.body: The fabric is very lightweight to the point that it shows whatever undergarments one is wearing. As it is a sweater material, it clings to every curve, which can be great if the person wearing it is in phenomenal shape and wants to reveal all of those features. I usually wear between a large and an extra large as I'm tall and pear shaped. I ordered a large for this dress, and I think I needed a medium for the upper half (the chest area) and an extra large for the bottom. In other words, the large did not fit well at all. The chest was loose. The skirt was too form fitting. I wanted to love this dress, but it is not flattering for my shape at all. I imagine that it would look great on someone with an hour glass or even a straight figure, but it is sadly, not an ideal choice for a pear. Read more
items.author: S. Brown

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great Color, Questionable Coverage
items.body: I loved the color, but the sizing was way off. Every time I moved my arms, the front of the dress opened up like it was trying to introduce my chest to the world. The last thing I need is my bra making a surprise appearance. The fabric is thin and lightweight—soft and a little warm—but overall the quality didn’t match the price. Cute idea, just not worth the accidental peep show. Read more
items.author: Jorge Montelongo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress!
items.body: This dress is cute, but just did not fit my body right I am not as full figured and curvy as I used to be so this dress did not work for me. I would say it runs fairly true to size but your figure has to match up with the proportions. Read more
items.author: WildWooly

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not At All What I Expected But...
items.body: It's much thinner than it looks in the picture, but I still wouldn't say it's bad quality. It's also shorter than expected, and I'm only 4'11"! I was thinking this would be a nice winter dress, but it wouldn't be as warm as I initially expected. It's more of a fall or spring dress. It runs small for sure. I got a size up because that was all that was available at the time, but if I had gotten my size it probably wouldn't have fit well. It's fairly form-fitting, although not unflattering. Still, if you're looking for something that's a little looser, maybe size up even two sizes. It is also very low-cut. I liked the wrap design for nursing, but instead of being modest when needed, it's immodest all the time. You could see my bra. If you're smaller busted and/or don't wear a full-coverage bra, it probably wouldn't be as obvious, but this is not appropriate for church or library storytime. Although it doesn't seem to fit the picture on the model, I don't think the price is crazy. It's a decent dress for what it is. Read more
items.author: x

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Meh
items.body: Initially I was very excited for this garment to arrive. It looks so cute in the pictures. Unfortunately, the material was pretty disappointing. The dress felt much like a shower curtain rather than a dress. It is quite large for its size as well, and although it does come with a sash for the waist line, it looks a little frumpy. Unfortunately, it is also a little see through as well, so I wasn’t comfortable wearing it out and about. Overall, it’s not the worst dress in the world but it fell short of meeting expectations. Read more
items.author: Kat

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too small and disappointing fabric
items.body: I ordered one size larger than my usual size and it was still too small. The fabric is scratchy. Not soft at all. Returning. Read more
items.author: Matt F.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hand wash, hang dry, mostly polyester. A little bit see through so careful with the undergarments
items.body: I love when items come in these zippy bags. I always appreciate good packaging (plus they’re useful afterwards). The color is as pictured. It’s mostly polyester with a little bit of spandex. This fabric feels like polyester so keep that in mind if you don’t like the feel of that type of fabric. It is a little bit see through over the entirety of the dress. It’s hand wash and hang dry. For something that takes extra care, it doesn’t “feel expensive”. It’s a casual dress. I live in a warmer climate so this will work for me for fall and much of winter but if you are in a chillier climate, this may be a bit thin to wear during that part of the year. When I saw the pictures I thought it was a wrap dress so I didn’t mind getting a large as I thought it would adjust a bit, it’s not and it doesn’t. I would not suggest ordering up. Order your normal size. Read more
items.author: LauraLyn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but would have been with better compact fabric
items.body: Design , dress flow and Color looks good but for me it’s little see through . The fabric would haven better quality or more compact . It’s comfortable and fits well though but do not feel like I ll use without layer inside it Read more
items.author: Kumari

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, Purple, Yellow, Coffee, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
